Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 208 rooms. A restaurant, a dining area, a TV room and a fireplace are available to guests of the accommodation. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment free. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is among the standard amenities of most rooms. The rooms have a queen-size bed or a king-size bed. Additional features include a fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station. An ironing set is also available for travellers' convenience. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, an alarm clock and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A range of options are available, including a gym, a sauna and a steam bath.
